name: Lucas' Adventures: Puzzles and Dungeons
description:
Lucas' Adventures is a puzzle adventure game made just by me.

Plot:

Once upon a time there was a couple of brothers, the boy was called Lucas and the girl was called Lola. One day when the two brothers were returning home, a terrible flying monster attacked the brothers and took Lola away. Lucas was desperate, but even so he went after the monster and spotted it on top of a tower.

As Aventuras do Lucas é um jogo de puzzles e aventura feito apenas por mim.

enredo:

Era uma vez um casal de irmãos, o menino se chama Lucas e a menina se chamava Lola. Certo dia quando os dois irmãos voltavam para casa, um terrivél monstro voador atacou os irmãos e levou Lola. Lucas ficou desesperado, mas mesmo assim ele foi atrás do monstro e o avistou no topo de uma torre.
